articles.author: Emmy Sasipornkarn
articles.title: Poland election: Polls open in tight presidential runoff - DW
articles.description: A pro-EU Warsaw mayor and a nationalist historian are neck-and-neck going into Sunday's vote. The result could have major implications for Poland's place in Europe. DW has the latest.
articles.content:
Polls show that the difference between Rafal Trzaskowski (L) and Karol Nawrocki (R) is within the margin of errorImage: Kacper Pempel/Lukasz Glowala/REUTERS
Poland's presidential runoff has boiled d… [+1575 chars]

articles.author: Jacob Oliva
articles.title: Chevy Corvette ZR1 Cleanly Smokes Ferrari And Lamborghini In A Race - CarBuzz
articles.description: The Chevy Corvette ZR1 is yet again a worthy contender against European exotics, particularly from Italy.
articles.content: Owners of the latest Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 will get their hands on the American supercar soon. And while they can't really make a profit out of it - at least not immediately - the ZR1 nameplate has … [+3051 chars]
